title: People are going to be angry about pylons.
description:
Pylons are about to become a lot more controversial in Britain. At the National Grid Training Centre, I climbed one. ■ The "Great Grid Upgrade": https://www.nationalgrid.com/the-great-grid-upgrade

National Grid also asked if I'd plug their Early Careers page, for anyone in the UK thinking of joining the industry: https://jobs.nationalgrid.com/UK/content/Early-careers/

Edited by Michelle Martin https://twitter.com/mrsmmartin
Audio mix by Dan Pugsley https://cassinisound.com
Thanks to Dave Brain for camera-sensor-dust paintouts @davebrainvfx
